original_title: Let's Go Crazy: The Grammy Salute to Prince
overview: A lineup of artists -- including Beck, Common, Gary Clark Jr., Foo Fighters, H.E.R., Juanes, Alicia Keys, John Legend, Chris Martin, Mavis Staples, St. Vincent, Usher and more -- pay tribute to Prince's unprecedented influence on music.
title: Let's Go Crazy: The Grammy Salute to Prince
